email_body:
Hello Customer Service,

My name is Rick Reed, and I am writing to request a refund for a recent
delivery of Samsung Phones.

I received the package at my address in Brazil, but I have decided not to
keep the items.

Product Details:

Item ID: TEC-PH-5841
Quantity: 5
The items are currently unopened in their original packaging. Please advise
on how I can return these for a full refund.

Thank you,
Rick ReedHello Customer Service, My name is Rick Reed, and I am writing to request a refund for a recent delivery of Samsung Phones.
